CustomField.formula:
AND(
IF( Opportunity.Visible_Settlement_Frequency__c, AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Settlement_Frequency_1__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Settlement_Frequency_2__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Antecipation_Frequency_1__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Antecipation_Frequency_2__c, "")) ), TRUE ),
IF( Opportunity.Visible_Others_Settlement_Frequency__c, AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Other_Payments_Settlement_Frequency_1__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Other_Payments_Settlement_Frequency_2__c, "")) ), TRUE ) )
CustomField.label: Are The Frequencies Filled
